revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_QueueCorpse}} '''A_QueueCorpse'''
(no parameters)
Adds the actor's corpse to the corpse queue. Queued corpses are limited to a specific amount set by the {{CVAR|C|sv_corpsequeuesize}} console variable. ''[[Hexen]]'' uses this to limit the amount of dead items in the game. It might be of interest for mods that produce a lot of dead bodies. Actors that you wish to use this feature should have this special occur somewhere in their death [[Actor states|state]].
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also ==
*[[A_DeQueueCorpse]]
{{DEFAULTSORT:QueueCorpse}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
